threadpool
  • Reference

Initialize Cluster Input Queue

Intialize the cluster input queue by adding all of the jobs based on the input data

initialize_cluster_queue(cl_name, x, f, meta, mapsize)

Arguments

cl_name

cluster name
x

the data
f

a function to map to the data
meta

arbitrary metadata for the applying the function f
mapsize

mapsize argument for underlying LMDB database

Contents

  • Arguments
